display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >= 4% oxygen desaturation or arousal
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba4 + hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 + carba4 + caroa4 + canba4 + canoa4 + oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 ) / slpprdp
